name: Useless Printer Simulation
description:
Printer Game Screenshot

The game was made for the Useless Simulation Jam https://itch.io/jam/useless-simulation-jam

Instructions

Click with your mouse, there aren't any more instructions because half the fun of the game is figuring out how to use your printer and to build strategies to get the most out of your printing life-style.

Installation

Windows Only.  Download the .exe file and run it.

The game requires .Net Framework v4 which should be available on most up to date Windows PCs, in case you don't have this you can find it here https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download
